@BorhamAndrew @FAANews @virgingalactic The feather has multiple redundant & independent sources of power & actuation. It’s been exhaustively tested under bizarrely challenging environments. Your other option is to trust parachutes, retrorockets, or a Hail Mary last-second maneuver that uses a combination of miracles.
